articles.title: Mumbai: Woman held with 345 gm of mephedrone
articles.description: A 23-year-old woman was held near a school in the north Mumbai suburb of Borivali allegedly with mephedrone, a synthetic stimulant drug, worth Rs 50 lakh, a police official said on Sunday.
